pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core or better
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: A set of printable artwork from game for Hentai Waifu Vol.1 fans.
